Mcspi_DataParam Struct Reference
MCSPI Driver API

Data packet element structure passed to submit function. More...

#include <bsp_mcspi.h>

Detailed Description

Data packet element structure passed to submit function.

Structure for the spi specific buffer address to be passed to the Stream.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Mcspi_DataParam::bufLen

Length of the buffer

UInt32 Mcspi_DataParam::flags

Flags - To indicate the Read / Write modes of operation

UInt8* Mcspi_DataParam::inBuffer

Data buffer - During transceive operation read data is stored in this buffer

UInt8* Mcspi_DataParam::outBuffer

Data buffer - During transceieve operation this buffer data is transmitted

Ptr Mcspi_DataParam::param

Extra parameter
